doc: Kebab-case css property names don't work for v-bind:style
Use the following syntax ` v-bind:style="{ margin-top: spacer + 'px' }">`
`The object syntax for v-bind:style is pretty straightforward - it looks almost like CSS, except itâ€™s a JavaScript object. You can use either camelCase or kebab-case for the CSS property names:`
Kebab-case is not working for the style binding, camelCase only works. See fiddle above.
The margin-top style for the element should contain the proper value
Vue is throwing an error `invalid expression: v-bind:style="{ margin-top: spacer + 'px' }"`
